Title: Decoding the Rosetta Stone: Unlocking Ancient Egypt
Description: In a 60-second journey, explore the Rosetta Stone, the key to deciphering ancient Egyptian hieroglyphs. Discover how this artifact bridged the past and the present. #RosettaStone #AncientEgypt #Hieroglyphs #HistoricalDiscovery

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The Rosetta Stone, discovered in 1799, was the breakthrough in translating Egyptian hieroglyphs.
